Title: Social Media Manager/Marketing Assistant - Montréal, QC - Indeed.com
Description:
Job Summary
Pin Media Inc. is growing and we're looking for a Social Media Manager/Marketing Assistant to join our team!
This individual will possess a strong understanding of the social media space and will be on top of all things social. They will use their expertise and passion to help develop and execute integrated social media plans to drive consumer engagement. They will have strong marketing skills to help execute strategies.
If this sounds like you, send us your resume and cover letter today!
Job Type / Category
Work closely with the marketing team to develop social media campaigns that help to achieve client marketing goals
Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos, and news)
Develop monthly reports on emerging social media trends that will be provided to clients
Monitor the client's social media accounts and offer constructive interaction with users
Create methods for finding and saving online customer reviews
Help with copywriting and correspondence
Perform research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences
Collaborate with Project Manager to ensure brand consistency
Oversee social media accounts’ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures, and blog layout)
Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications
Required Education, Skills and Qualifications
.
2 years of experience in social media management
Exceptional multi-tasking skills and a strong sense of initiative
Able to explain complex social media data in an understandable way
Strong problem-solving skills
Knowledge of Facebook’s advertising platform is a plus
Hands-on experience in content management
Excellent copywriting and communication skills
Ability to deliver creative content (text, image, and video)
Knowledge of online marketing channels
Fluent in French and English
Company Profile
Pin Media Inc. is a digital marketing agency with over 10 years of combined experience in digital marketing and advertising. Our goal is to create engaging content to build our clients' audiences and keep them captivated.
Our services include social media management and advertising, website development, SEO, Google Ads, and email marketing. We’re ready to help businesses leave a lasting impression in the online sphere.

Title: Digital Strategist - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Overview
We’re looking for passionate and innovative thinkers ready to lead brands into the future of communications. Our team is highly-collaborative and moves fast executing programs, campaigns and ideas.
We’re looking for a
Digital Strategist
to join our team. You are perceptive, collaborative and agile with sharp strategic instincts. You know what’s on-trend in the digital space, and love creating experiences through content. You are a creative thinker – always tinkering with new ways to approach old problems to find the best solutions for your client.
The responsibilities and qualifications for this job may sound familiar, but the person we’re looking for is actually quite unique. That’s because Ketchum is different. We are intuitive, skilled practitioners – risk-takers not afraid to try new things and don’t believe in settling for the tried and true. If this sounds intriguing, you probably belong here with us. And in this role, you will be a critical part of taking our team to the next level.
About the Job
Demonstrate understanding of client and business needs, goals, and competitive environments
Drive and execute digital and social media campaigns to help achieve clients’ objectives
Be a hands-on team player adding value, sharing creative ideas, and executing digital programs
Create digital solutions to answer client's business needs
Develop and implement strategies and tactical programs to influence audiences across digital and social ecosystems
Educate and inform our internal teams (creative, planning and account teams) to help become confident with all types of digital engagements
Knowledge in using social media platforms to drive brand awareness and engagement.
Produce content strategy documents for brands, including style guides, content and chanel strategies, content audits, gap analyses, editorial calendars, content sourcing plans and production production requirements as needed
Write content concepts and bring to life creative ideas
Qualifications
3-5 years' Digital interactive experience
Recognized expertise in developing strategic creative solutions for clients
Ability to provide clear creative conceptual direction and to motivate cross functional teams
Strong writing and editing skills. Ability to extract insights from large amounts of information. Comfort developing presentations and presenting your ideas.
An understanding of digital platforms, the opportunities and challenges they present and opinions on what will work best and why.
An appreciation of storytelling and a desire to find the narrative in anything.
A working knowledge of current digital technologies, publishing tools and trends in the advertising, communications and marketing industries.
Understanding of standard approaches to data analytics, ads implementation, application development and platform integration
About Ketchum
As a global communications consultancy with 90 plus years of experience, Ketchum is a trusted partner who is equal parts creative and analytical. Ketchum is a place where all perspectives and points of view are welcome and encouraged. We are a collection of communications specialists, content creators, creatives, researchers, data analysts, media pros, digital strategists, issues and crisis counselors, and tech nerds. And we love when those worlds collide to create the very best teams and solutions for our clients. We work with the world’s leading brands, emerging start-ups, and everything in between. We are beyond proud to have created some of the most celebrated and award-winning campaigns in our industry. We’re just crazy enough to think we can impact the world – and how it responds to ideas – through communication.
We encourage our employees to be curious, brave, inspiring, and a force for good. Let’s talk. Come belong at Ketchum!

Title: Social Media Coordinator - Vancouver, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Glory Kills Production is a Vancouver-based company that specializes in creating and managing social media content for a diverse range of influencers and talents. We believe in being positive influences and building our clients' brand. We encourage applicants to Google us to learn more about our work.
Our team is a group of passionate and driven individuals from across Canada. We’re looking for a multi-talented individual who can work independently with minimal supervision and still be able to produce results.
We need a skilled individual to build and maintain our company’s social media presence. Our Social Media Coordinator will be responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring the company's social media strategy in order to increase brand awareness, improve marketing efforts, and increase sales. The typical duties are to research marketing trends, post content on each relevant platform, and encourage audience engagement. The ideal candidate will have experience collaborating with freelance marketing and sales professionals to develop successful social media campaigns. This role will report to our Marketing Director.
Job Responsibilities:
Build and manage the following social media accounts;
GKP’s Instagram account
GKP’s Twitter account
GKP’s TikTok
ALL Talents’ Twitter and Reddit account; currently 4 accounts on each platform
GKP Instagram;
Collab with an in-house graphic designer to create monthly grids that fit the company’s branding
Select IG appropriate photos with GD to work with
Schedule grid posts with witty/captivating captions. Tagging photographers and sponsors.
Create and post IG stories and engage with followers in the DMs
Collect and record data in the company provide spreadsheet tracker to measure which posts are successful
Record number of likes and comments of each post
Click-through rate of links
GKP Twitter;
Schedule daily tweets to encourage click-through and engagement
Collab with Account Manager to schedule tweets about upcoming OF promotions and Models’ live streams.
Collect and record data in the company provide spreadsheet tracker to measure which posts are successful
Record number of retweets and comments
Click-through rates
GKP TikTok;
Keep track of trends
Collab with Talents and GKP team to create content
Collect and record data in the company provide spreadsheet tracker to measure which posts are successful
Record number of likes and comments
Talents’ Twitter and Reddit;
Outsource and manage individuals to schedule post content and interact with fans to move them to the Talents’ monetary platforms.
Track the progress of each Talents’ account and record it on the company spreadsheet.
Collab with AM to schedule tweets about upcoming OF promotions and live streams.
Technical Skills required:
Experience with Asana
Experience with Slack
Experience with Google Sheets
Knowledge of Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, and Reddit’s policies
*Contract position. Renew every 6-months with bonus pay after a completed contract. Full-time position with salary, benefits, vacation, and holiday pay offer after a year.*
Contract length: 6 months

Bonus pay
Benefits:

8 hour shift
Monday to Friday
Overtime

Title: Marketing and Social Media Coordinator - Burnaby, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Social Media and Campaign Coordinator
ABOUT US:
Couture Pop-Ups is a fashion resource for people throughout Canada. We’re a growing dynamic business currently looking for a creative & driven individual who has a passion for fashion to join our team.
Couture Pop-Ups is a Vancouver based company traveling throughout Canada doing luxury designer pop-up sales for men & women. We carry a curated selection of desired luxury accessories, clothing, handbags, and shoes at discounted rates up to 80% off the original MSRP.
Our social media platforms are our biggest asset in attracting customers to our events, so we aim to create relevant campaigns & content that people intrigued by. We’re looking for a Social Media Campaign Coordinator who will lead all our social platforms, to grow our online presence. The right individual would be fluent in social media trends, monitoring and optimizing campaigns on the following platforms - Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and LinkedIn.
An ideal candidate for us, is someone who’s well versed in fashion and knows how to draw the attention of fellow fashion lovers through visual & written content. Attention to detail is key, so we need to ensure all the content for our social media channels are relevant to the current cultural demographic that we are targeting. This role is the perfect fit for an organized, visually creative person with strong writing skills and a good eye and appreciation for brand aesthetic.
DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
Plan and execute all visual and written content on Couture Pop Ups social channels (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and LinkedIn)
Write strong, punchy social copy that connects with new audiences
Manage a weekly/monthly social & email content calendar that is approved by Marketing & Brand Leadership
Support campaign and content planning for sales events, and collaborations across all channels (homepage, email, organic social, and paid advertising).
Maintain the marketing calendar to ensure channels are set up to activate to plan
Create marketing briefs and timelines for proposed campaigns
Build email marketing campaigns and implements segmentation
Monitor analytics and create reports to provide insights on performance of campaigns
Support photoshoot planning and production
Oversee photography & video file management
Manage timelines, ensuring all milestones are met
SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:
1-2 years of similar professional experience in an agency or corporate environment with demonstrable examples of success.
Related diploma, degree, or equivalent experience (asset but not required)
Experience actively managing a social platform with an audience of at least 10K followers
Strong understanding of digital marketing and social media best practices
Excellent writing and storytelling skills
Visually strong with a good eye and appreciation for brand aesthetic
Keen to take on new opportunities and challenges, with a passion to continue to develop and grow
Part-time hours:
10-20 per week
Job Types:
Part-time, Contract
Salary:
$22.00-$25.00 per hour to start
Benefits:
Flexible schedule
Mix of in office & Work from home (MUST BE VANCOUVER BASED)
Language: English
Part-time hours: 20-25 per week
Application deadline: 2021-09-07
Job Types: Part-time, Permanent
Salary: $22.00-$25.00 per hour
Additional pay:
Overtime pay
Benefits:
Casual dress
Flexible schedule
On-site parking
Store discount
COVID-19 considerations:
For this role you will never be interacting with general public as our office location is not open to the public.

Social Media Marketing: 2 years (preferred)

No

Title: Communications and Social Media Specialist - Vancouver, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Are you looking to add to your client base?
We’re private family holding company with five focus areas: apparel, real estate, philanthropy, private equity and passive investments. We are a proudly West Coast company, with a vision to create possibilities for people to live longer, healthier, more fun lives.
We are currently in search for a Communications and Social Media Specialist.
Your primary goal would be to maintain periodic social media presence of our Company (Hold it All Inc.), and the social media of some of our subsidiaries and owners. As well, you would act as a single point of reference for specific communications projects, liaising with a variety of communication firms/agencies.
Responsibilities in more detail:
Research and develop stories to share on social media and with traditional media and influencers.
Coordinate responses on any media requests and questions with appropriate person from HIA.
Every 2 weeks, create relevant posts on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn to raise awareness and to grow followers.
Every 2 weeks inform our President on communications and social media actions and activity.
Monitor the marketing of an autobiography (free downloads) via pre-existing social media online marketing program.
Keep current HIA, W5F, Kits Beach Capital and Solve FSHD websites.
When needed, source and vet external PR agencies and communications vendors.
Act as a single point of reference for HIA and project manage communications projects with specialty communication firms/agencies.
Working with Us
We’re a team of outdoors-loving and health-conscious people, who take great pride in the open and inclusive work culture we have built. We encourage people to speak up and we hear all voices equally. We’re driven to maximize the potential of the people we work with, we value learning, integrity, and fun, and are passionate about working with people who share these values.
This is a part-time freelance/contractor role. We welcome you to our beautiful Gastown office in Vancouver, BC. We offer a casual working environment with amenities including a beautifully-appointed kitchen, rooftop terrace, and end of trip facilities for those of you who love to bike to work or get your workout in before your workday begins.

Title: Marketing Project Coordinator - Kelowna, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Location:
Planet Earth
Status:
Full-time employee
Reports to:
VP, Marketing
The Company
The Direct-to-Consumer (DTC) eCommerce landscape is growing faster than ever before with new brands being created and launched every day. But with more brands launching, the ability to stand out and scale becomes increasingly challenging.
At Strawhouse we build and grow thriving businesses rooted in expertise, speed, and human ingenuity. From concept to sustainable growth, we help eCommerce brands bring dreams to life through technology and human-led collaboration.
Over the last seven years, we have pioneered a business model that allows for the best consumer products to win, generating over a billion dollars in gross merchandise volume for our brand partners.
We're not an agency, not a venture fund but something different altogether. By blending our capital, strategy, and operational expertise we drive exponential growth for our brand partners.
Strawhouse focuses on speed at scale, leveraging our deep experience to focus on Fast Moving Consumer Goods, particularly the verticals of health, wellness, and better-for-you food.
Role Profile
As a Marketing Project Coordinator, you support Strawhouse’s Marketing team across a wide range of projects and initiatives. From coordinating new brand onboarding, to liaising with creative contractors, to producing research decks; you are a critical enablement resource across the organization.
You pride yourself on being proactive, attentive, and detailed. Striving to identify gaps in processes and communication, and acting quickly to ensure projects stay on track and all team deliverables are completed to a high standard of quality.
You thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Constantly seeking ways to optimize, simplify, and eventually automate marketing processes and workflows. On a regular basis you are meeting with Business Development, Operations, and Marketing stakeholders; spearheading initiatives to improve cross-functional communications and collaboration.
Key Accountabilities
Ownership over the execution and optimization of our brand onboarding process
Championing and leading the Marketing team’s usage of Asana for task and project management
Performing market research and competitive analysis to support brand strategy
Taking a leading role in the creation and distribution of customer surveys; along with analysis of survey data and creation of research decks to summarize findings
Completion and distribution of creative briefs; management of external contractor resources
Supporting Marketing team reporting requirements
Assisting with visual asset and content collection and creation for digital marketing campaigns
Additional tasks and projects as required
Must Haves
A Bachelor’s Degree in Management, Marketing, Business Administration, or related field, or relevant marketing or operational experience
Excellent verbal & written communication skills in English
eCommerce marketing experience is a big plus
Previous experience in a Project Coordinator / Manager, Marketing Coordinator or similar role is an asset
Strong research skills with ability to quickly synthesize large amounts of data and surface key insights
Experience using Microsoft Office and G Suite tools (Docs/Word, Sheets/Excel, and Slides/Powerpoint in particular)
Experience with Asana or other project management tools is a big plus
Comfortable learning and using a multitude of tools. Typeform, GetBravo, Google Data Studio, SEM Rush, Google Trends & Canva; to name a few.
Possess an innate curiosity to understand our brands, products, and target audience personas - and how we “do marketing at Strawhouse”
Creative and adaptive problem-solver
Proactive team player
Evidence of self-management and effective prioritization while juggling multiple projects
Rewards
Competitive compensation calibrated by experience
Comprehensive health and dental group benefits plan
Opportunity for equity and performance based compensation
Commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion
Strawhouse is committed to cultivating and preserving a company culture that benefits from a breadth of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We know that we will grow stronger and learn better with a diverse team. When recruiting for new members of our team, we welcome the unique contributions that you might bring from your education, culture, ethnicity, race, sex, gender identity and expression, age, religion, and sexual orientation.
Application
Please apply directly via BambooHR website.
Please note that while Strawhouse sincerely welcomes interest in this vacancy, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Title: Marketing Manager - Mississauga, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Do you have BIG ideas?? Are you someone who thrives on creativity and innovation? Well, do we have a job for you! Northern Fitness, is looking to hire a
Marketing Manager
to lead the development and execution of our marketing strategy. As a Canadian born fitness company, our mission is to make fitness accessible to everyone, everywhere, and to be one of the top three specialty fitness retailers in Canada. One of your first projects will be to prepare for the transition into the new brand, equip, and create excitement around the experience driven showroom for Q2 of 2022. We need YOU to help get us there.
As the Marketing Manager your day-to-day responsibilities will be to:
Develop and update the marketing calendar, ensuring marketing initiatives are consistent with brand positioning and strategic priorities
Propose new and engaging marketing initiatives that will increase customer engagement and drive sales
Proactively look for opportunities to build brand awareness
Support the launch of the flagship retail store by facilitating events/activations
Work with the digital marketing agency on paid ads
Lead community management initiatives, promotions and sales
Research latest marketing and social media trends and capitalize on SEO.
Develop communications strategy (social media posts, email, blog)
Manage social media accounts and promote engagement with our following
Establish partnerships with aligned organizations/individuals and develop collateral and design briefs
Liaise with Director of Sales and Marketing to develop and manage promotional budgets
Research and analyze existing customers and core customer segments
Provide monthly reports on marketing performance
Manage agency providers, consultants, freelancers and other suppliers, including contract negotiation and management
The right candidate will demonstrate on their resume:
At least 5 years’ experience in a full-time marketing role
University degree in marketing or closely related discipline
Strong knowledge of digital marketing, branding, and customer lifecycle management
Excellent computer and software skills
Graphic Design experience
Prior experience in the fitness industry (considered an asset)
During the interview process, we will be looking for behaviours that demonstrate:
Deep understanding and knowledge of marketing trends and best practices
An organized and detail-oriented mindset
Ability to work efficiently under strict timelines, while ensuring accuracy
A commitment to delivering quality work
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Positive attitude and willingness to go above and beyond on a daily basis
What’s in it for you?
Competitive compensation $65-$75k
Performance bonus based on KPIs
Health Spending Account
Equipment Spending Allowance on Northern Fitness Products
Hybrid work environment
Think you’d be a good fit?
Please apply online with your cover letter and resume in one document.
While we thank all candidates who apply, we will only be reaching out to those who meet the basic requirements on their resume.

Bonus pay

Title: Digital Marketing Coordinator - London, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Do have an interest in the healthcare industry as a business?
Do you have a passion for utilizing digital communication to build, promote and maintain a brand?
Are you social media savvy and motivated to capture the customers attention through creative means online?
If you responded yes to the above questions, Trudell Healthcare Solutions Inc. “(THS)” currently has an exciting opportunity for you as a
Digital Marketing Coordinator!
Our Company:
Trudell Healthcare Solutions Inc.
is a Canadian, family-owned clinical and service-oriented distributor providing unique, innovative products to select segments of the Canadian healthcare market. With a skilled, knowledgeable and motivated team, the company is committed to exceeding our customer’s expectations in delivering cost effective solutions to improve patient outcomes.
The Position:
The Digital Marketing Coordinator provides support directly to the Marketing Department and indirectly to the Sales and Customer Experience teams. The position is responsible for managing all products’ digital presence within the product catalog, website, ERP and social media. The position supports the Sales team for individual and regional product tradeshow needs and meetings, both digital and in person. Additional responsibilities include maintaining the sales support systems including ACTO, Gateway and other corporate tools, managing brand labels, IFUs and promotional material for TruTest products. The position is responsible for leading the implementation of the digital marketing strategy and maintains corporate branding. This position also acts as backup support for the Product Coordinator and assists the Product Managers in the development of digital strategy within each portfolio while maintaining a presence on social media.
Key Responsibilities:
Product and Market Information
Ensure cooperation in developing and updating product information to Company intranet, Catalogue, Social Media and Website.
Develop broad knowledge of supplier products to effectively support the requirements of the product marketing and sales teams.
Maintain product related information within the Company’s ERP system.
Maintain effective management of product set up processes in coordination with other marketing team members.
Ensure sample selector list is current with available supplier samples.
Ensure up to date marketing materials and training resources for all products are obtained and properly housed in specified locations.
Lead the administration of the ACTO platform, ensuring all content is current and aligned with promotional and sales focus.
Develop and maintain private label branding for new products, including product labels, IFU’s and marketing collateral.
Sales and Customer Service Support
Create custom marketing materials as needed by Marketing Managers and Sales team.
Support the management of the marketing inbox as required.
Provide digital and social media management to facilitate sales campaigns and corporate awareness.
Support requests for sample products and literature following the sample management guide.
Lead the management of national and regional tradeshows, coordinate resources and personnel with marketing and sales.
Support the Trial & Evaluation process for the sales team.
Vendor Relations and RFX Management
Collaborate with the RFX team to drive success of RFP bids as required.
Cultivate positive relationships with suppliers.
Manage permissions from suppliers for digital marketing initiatives. Ensure compliance with all requirements.
Maintain LinkedIn presence and coordination with vendor posts to social media
Communication
Ensure communication is effective and informative regarding issues which may affect the quality of service or products.
Ensure high responsiveness and clear communication to the Sales team.
Collaborate with other functional areas across THS to resolve issues and seek new ways to improve the business.
Administration
Ensure administrative support is provided to Marketing/ Product Managers.
Ensure cooperation with special projects as required.
Requirements, Qualifications & Skills:
Post secondary education in Business, Digital Marketing or equivalent.
Minimum of two (2) years’ experience in a similar marketing role.
Experience in the Healthcare industry is preferred.
Knowledge of Medical terminology and product usage in the field is an asset.
Excellent organizational skills.
Adobe Create Suite expertise.
B2B marketing experience is an asset.
Strong skills in Microsoft Office applications – Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook.
Essential Duties:
Long periods of seated and computer work.
Ability to work flexible hours.
Fluent in French would be an asset
Ability to travel.
Working Conditions:
Home/ Office setting
Frequent interruptions
Compensation based on a regular work week of thirty-seven and one half (37.5) working hours, with additional working hours as required to meet ongoing business demands and to fulfill job responsibilities.
What We Offer:
In addition to fair and equitable compensation and the excitement of working for a growing and reputable company, we offer:
Challenging careers that provide the opportunity to learn constantly
Clear, consistent and demonstrated values
Encouraged Professional Development
Employee Recognition for Milestone Anniversaries
Regular Performance Appraisals
Paid Sick Days
3 weeks paid vacation to start
Comprehensive Group Family Benefits including:
Health and Dental Benefits
Pension Plan
Life Insurance
Employee Assistance Plan
Disability Insurance
Out of Country Insurance Coverage
Since 1922, Trudell Healthcare Solutions Inc., a member of the Trudell Medical Group, has been a stable and financially sound Canadian-based employer, headquartered in London, Ontario. For over 90 years, we have enjoyed the reputation of being successful and trustworthy in the eyes of our customers, our suppliers and our staff. We are passionate about selling, servicing and distributing technologically advanced Critical Care and Respiratory products and state-of-the-art Operating Room products to hospitals across Canada.
We offer development opportunities, employee recognition, fair and equitable compensation. Please submit your resume with the subject line
Digital Marketing Coordinator”,
to Human Resources, at
hr@trudellhs.com
.
We thank all applicants for their interest in joining our team. Only those to be interviewed will be contacted.
For more information, visit us at
www.trudellhs.com
. Trudell Healthcare Solutions Inc. is an equal opportunity employer it is important to our Company that all its employees, including those with disabilities, find our workplace to be welcoming and supportive. If you are a candidate with a disability who requires accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know.

Title: Digital Marketing Analyst - Brampton, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Digital Marketing Analyst - 12 Month Contract (Hybrid)
*Temporarily remote due to COVID-19 regulations*
As the Digital Marketing Analyst, you will use your expertise in SalesForce Marketing Cloud to design and implement various marketing campaigns. You will collaborate with marketing, cross-functional teams, and vendors to integrate, deploy and support project based marketing campaigns. You will also utilize your skillset in HTML5 coding of responsive emails and lead the implementation of landing pages.
We are excited to offer a new and adaptive way of working that provides flexibility in the workforce while maintaining operational readiness! By blending remote and in-office work, we are able to take advantage of the independence and flexibility that comes with working from home, and the collaboration, teamwork and sense of belonging that comes from working together face-to-face. Our Workstyle Program offers the best of both situations: structure and sociability with independence and flexibility.
What You'll Be Doing:
Develop customer journeys for email nurture campaigns that target unique customer segments.
Leverage existing marketing assets to create consumer facing email campaigns.
Build and organize customer data segments.
Partner with marketing and product groups to evaluate and develop concepts for digital marketing assets, and liaise with internal and external development teams to provide requirements in order to ensure execution.
Build and organize customer journeys within the marketing automation platform.
Schedule and deploy customer emails.
Build and deploy web assets using the Content Management System.
Lead the planning and designing of mobile responsive websites and applications.
What We're Looking For:
Post-secondary education is required in the field of Marketing or Computer Science.
3-5 years of related work experience is required.
SalesForce Marketing Cloud Administrator Certification is required.
Refined analytical skills are required to review various customer journeys and develop logic to model scenarios based upon customer behaviours that will re-engage or continue to engage customers.
Refined computer/technical skills are required to use MS Office, SaleForce Marketing Cloud, Content Management Systems, Google Analytics, and Firebase.
Refined time management/multi-tasking is required to balance multiple projects and deadlines while prioritizing deliverables.
Intermediate project/process management is required to lead and participate in projects involving various internal and external stakeholders.
Intermediate equipment operation is required to use the Canon consumer product line.
French is an asset.
WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU:
COVID-19 SAFETY PRECAUTIONS:
By monitoring public health conditions and following local COVID-19 guidelines, we are taking necessary precautions and putting the safety of our employees and candidates first.
REMOTE WORK:
This position offers a Hybrid work schedule. You will be required to be in the office Mondays and Wednesdays each week, with the ability to work from home for the remainder of the week (subject to specific business needs requiring office attendance).
When working from home, a reliable internet connection is required. Remote work is supported with cloud-based applications and collaboration tools.
BENEFITS:
Pay in-lieu of benefits.
Discounts on Canon products, retailers, memberships and more.
EMPLOYEE PERKS:
On-site cafeteria and outdoor patio.
Employee gym and fitness centre.
Employee referral program.
Inspire Program, online peer-to-peer recognition for redeemable points on hundreds of products.
Community involvement.

Title: Digital Marketing Coordinator - White Rock, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Monark is committed to helping great ideas live up to their fullest potential. Our diverse team delivers world-class solutions across a diverse array of emerging & established lines of business.

Title: Marketing Coordinator - Canada - Indeed.com
Description:
Belca Soft Corporation is looking for a creative, passionate, and driven Marketing Coordinator to join our dynamic team, where we believe that work should be challenging, and the challenge should be fun.
You will own the creation and direction of content marketing initiatives across multiple platforms and formats. The ultimate goal is to increase website traffic and drive engagement, qualified lead generation, customer retention, and other positive client-related outcomes.
You will help define our brand story, in addition to developing consistency for our brand’s storytelling.
You will work directly with digital marketing, marketing analytics, sales leaders, and key Subject Matter Experts and report directly to the Director of Marketing.
Summary
Compensation will commensurate with experience and performance
Location: Canada and/or U.S.A.
Permanent, full time
40 hrs/week
Benefits: Bonus, Disability benefits, Medical benefits, Dental benefits, Group insurance benefits, Life insurance benefits, Vision care benefits
Combination of remote/in-office
Areas of responsibility:
Assist in developing and implementing marketing plans based upon the corporate strategic goals
Collect and report market intelligence data (reports on competitors, product and pricing intelligence)
Develop quarterly, multi-channel (social media, podcast, email, video, etc.) content calendar based on company objectives to achieve short and long-term content goals
Conduct internal/external topic research and generate original content that aligns with company voice and style; including, long- and short-form blog posts, eBooks, whitepapers, press releases, case studies, infographics, presentations, sales collateral, video and podcast scripts, and more, to be distributed across multiple marketing channels
Write SEO-driven copy and content that increases traffic and ranking, is on-brand, and articulately communicates the value of RigER to the target audiences to increase awareness, consideration, and conversion
Create marketing materials and tools such as brochures, catalogs, promotional videos and movies, PPTs, templates, datasheets, project pictures, corporate gifts, etc
Produce visual and written content daily that speaks to the US/Can target market on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and other resonant platforms. Place ads on social media channels via dedicated social tools like Facebook ads manager
Launch, monitor Google Ads campaigns and provide suggestions on optimization of ads
Prepare marketing reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data with Marketing Director
Monitor budgets by comparing actual results with plans and forecasts
What would make you a great candidate/Requirements:
1-3 years’ experience in marketing, PR, content creation/videography, social media management, or another relevant communications role
You know when to ask questions and how to get the job done without all the answers
You have strong communication and relationship management skills
Strong copywriting and storytelling, editing, and proofreading skills for the creation of web pages, emails, marketing, and sales enablement collateral
Proficiency in design and creative tools such as Canva, Illustrator, Photoshop, etc. or similar
Familiarity with marketing tools such as Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Analytics, Google Ads, etc
Familiarity with WordPress and the ability to create and edit pages and posts, upload images and graphics and manage the CMS as needed
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Journalism, Design, Communications or related field
How to apply
By email
info (at) belcasoft.com
Intended job posting audience
Anyone who can legally work in Canada can apply for this job. If you are not currently authorized to work in Canada, the employer will not consider your job application.
Advertised until
To be determined

Title: Marketing Assistant - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
You have got your feet wet in the marketing realm but you know you can offer so much more and want to learn. You are happy to be involved in multiple projects that are all ongoing at the same time and can balance your priorities to get the job done. You are technology savvy so that you can work independently but also know when to reach out for help and how to find the resources you need. You want to help us make a difference in the world.
This role reports to the Marketing Manager.
You will also be working & collaborating with a team of individuals who are passionate about helping others, energy conservation and making a positive impact on the environment.
Primary Responsibilities:
Marketing Planning and Execution
Contributing to the development and execution of marketing strategies and plans that drive results across multiple channels
Event coordination from initiation to reporting, including tracking invitations, RSVP’s, securing venues, event participation, coordinating room preparation, surveys, thank-you and follow-up
Working collaboratively with internal and external stakeholders and vendors to support multiple projects including campaigns , promotional events, and special events
Digital Marketing
Assist in the development and execution of digital plans and campaigns that support revenue and communications objectives for websites, social media, newsletter, and email campaigns
Assist in implementing and tracking against SEO/SEM strategies on the website
Sound understanding of website management tools (like WordPress) to make content changes
Marketing Communication
Assisting with the development of company branded collateral, PowerPoint presentations and other written materials, ensuring consistency in all communications, brand image and messaging
Helping with business development projects as needed
Assisting team by managing PR relationships and PR activity
Analytics & Reporting
Tracking performance, analyzing, and reporting on campaign analytics, conversions, and results to inform future strategies and plans.
provide regular updates and reports to management as needed.
Other requirements and responsibilities in line with organizational need.
Minimum Qualifications
University degree in Communications, Commerce, Marketing or related discipline
1- 2 years experience in related position and/or field
Experience driving ROI for companies using paid, owned, and earned offline and digital media and channel attribution strategies.
Exceptional research, writing, and editing skills to write/create/produce materials across a variety of platforms/channels (web, digital, print, social media, email, etc.).
Experience in google analytics, google ads, social media ads manager
Ability to adhere to brand standards
Ability to manage events and report on success post event completion
Ability to manage multiple projects and relationships at a given time
Strong analytics expertise; the ability to analyze/measure/consolidate performance across a variety of digital platforms and offer recommendations based on the data
Interpersonal: Leadership, collaboration, detail-oriented
Compensation
Competitive base annual salary and full company benefits are available for the right candidate.

Title: Social Media & Digital Engagement Specialist - London, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Classification & Regular Hours
Hours per Week: 35
Salary Grade: 14
Please note, this is a temporary full-time contract opportunity with an anticipated end date of April 29, 2022.
About Western
Since 1878, Western University has been committed to serving our communities through the pursuit of academic excellence and by providing students, faculty, and community members with life-long opportunities for intellectual, social, and cultural growth. We seek excellent students, faculty, and staff to join us in what has become known as the "Western Experience" - an opportunity to contribute to a better world through the development of new knowledge, new abilities, new connections, and new ways to make a difference.
About Us
Western Communications staff seek to enhance, promote and protect the reputation of the university.
Responsibilities
The Social Media & Digital Engagement Specialist will collaborate with Western Communications colleagues to support Western’s digital communication goals of strategic storytelling, constituent engagement, knowledge mobilization, brand building and community communications through the use of digital and social media channels. The role will plan and develop high-visibility digital content programs and plans that support Western’s strategies, in alignment with social media best practices and the University’s values and positions. Under the leadership of the Digital Content Manager, the Specialist will manage complex content and promotional projects, consulting with campus-wide stakeholders at a variety of levels, including senior leadership, with the goal of contributing to the continued improvement and excellent professional practice within the department and campus-wide, through ongoing consultation and training, as well as internal thought leadership and guidance to colleagues in addition to a team of student employees. The Specialist will stay apprised and lead their own investigation of professional best practices for creating meaningful digital content and engagement.
Qualifications
Education:
Undergraduate Degree in Media Information Technology, English, Public Relations, Communications, Marketing or related program
Experience:
3 years’ experience coordinating social media accounts in a professional setting
Experience working in the post-secondary sector is preferred
Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:
Strong expertise with theory and best practices in media relations and public affairs
Advanced skills with e-communication tools, including website and graphic design principles, and with social media platforms
Ability to apply creativity and recommend strategies for engagement initiatives in response to cultural and social trends
Leadership, public speaking and project management with the ability to lead digital communications campaigns with a student team as well as internal training
Excellent attention to detail and proofreading abilities
Discretion, tact and maturity to deal with public relations issues related to higher education, including proposing nuanced, sensitive resolutions
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, meet tight deadlines and adapt to changing priorities
Ability to analyze metrics and consider past communications to craft engaging written communications using social media or other appropriate channels
Ability to work within a flexible schedule to accommodate the University’s events and activities
Advanced skills with Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator and Premiere
Proven ability and natural inclination to develop relationships by interacting with people in a professional, respectful and diplomatic manner
Western Values Diversity
The University invites applications from all qualified individuals. Western is committed to employment equity and diversity in the workplace and welcomes applications from women, members of racialized groups/visible minorities, Indigenous persons, persons with disabilities, persons of any sexual orientation, and persons of any gender identity or gender expression.
Accommodations are available for applicants with disabilities throughout the recruitment process. If you require accommodations for interviews or other meetings, please contact Human Resources at hrhelp@uwo.ca or phone
519-661-2194
.
Please Note:
Effective September 7, 2021, all employees and visitors to campus are required to comply with Western's
COVID-19 Vaccination Policy
.
We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those chosen for an interview will be contacted.

Title: Marketing Coordinator - Guelph, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
JOB DESCRIPTION
We are seeking a talented, highly motivated, self-starting creative individual with a passion for connecting with current and future real estate buyers and sellers through content marketing, social media, and traditional marketing efforts. Applicants should have a well-developed capacity for coordinating and implementing marketing communication projects with responsibilities in social media, public relations, search marketing, advertising, brand stewardship, content creation, and photo/video editing capability. Familiarity with standard concepts, practices and procedures within marketing and advertising is critical. Create, deliver and edit marketing materials and advertising campaigns that are effective and timely. Manage website design, content, SEO development and tracking analytics to ensure all content is up to date and relevant. Manage all social media platforms and ensure a proper online presence. An eye for detail is vital as you will be working with words and many images daily.
Support the company and agents through tracking incoming leads/prospects so marketing campaigns can be adjusted accordingly to help ensure company growth. Manage all email marketing campaigns. Plan and organize all team and community events, take photos/video, and then market on social media. Create, submit and monitor all advertising whether that is print or digital marketing.
If you’re ready to take your career to the next level and have fun while you do it, we want to hear from you.
QUALIFICATIONS:
Degree/Diploma in Marketing, Advertising and/or Communications
Experience with Canva and email marketing platforms
Excellent communication skills with a positive, upbeat attitude
Willingness to bring new ideas to the table & can take on responsibility
Maintains an open mind to new ideas and suggestions
Creative individual who can develop innovative forward design concepts
Community fundraising and event planning experience
Ability to adapt and find quick solutions in fast-paced environments
Copywriting capabilities
Knowledge of Mac OS
JOB TYPE
Full-time
Benefit Plan + Paid Time Off
Salary: $40,000.00 to $45,000.00 / year
EXPERIENCE
Marketing: 2 years (Preferred)
Fundraising / Event Planning: 1 year (Preferred)
Application deadline: 2021-11-25
Expected start date: 2022-01-03
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $40,000.00-$45,000.00 per year
Benefits:
Paid time off
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Work remotely:
No

Title: Marketing digital - Moncton, NB - Indeed.com
Description:
Titre du cours
Marketing digital
Campus
Moncton
Type
Chargées et chargés de cours
Faculté
Faculté d'administration
Sigle du cours
ADMK 3341 (01M)
Exigences de qualification pour l'enseignement (EQE)
Doctorat en administration (option/concentration marketing) ou
Scolarité de doctorat en administration (option/concentration marketing) ou
Maîtrise spécialisée en marketing ou
MBA (option/concentration en marketing) ou Maîtrise dans un domaine connexe
Pour les personnes possédant la maîtrise, il faut une expérience pertinente directement reliée au cours à enseigner.
La personne doit avoir une maîtrise de la langue française tant à l’oral qu’à l’écrit, faire preuve de ses connaissances théoriques et pratiques et de méthodes de travail permettant l’apprentissage des étudiantes et des étudiants et connaître les applications technologiques (PowerPoint, Excel, etc.) utilisées à la Faculté d’administration.
Description du cours à enseigner
Remarque: Dû à la pandémie de COVID-19, les cours pourraient être offerts à distance à la session d’hiver 2022.
À noter : La chargée ou le chargé de cours devra être en mesure de dispenser le cours le mardi de 18h00 à 21h00. Les trames horaires étant maintenant déterminées lors de l’inscription avancée.
Impact de l'Internet sur la fonction et les activités traditionnelles de marketing. Les principaux domaines et techniques du marketing digital. La stratégie web, les mesures de performance web (Web analytics), le référencement, la conversion, l'engagement et le marketing mobile.
OBJECTIFS DE COURS :
À la fin de ce cours, la personne étudiante devrait être en mesure de : interpréter les différences entre le marketing traditionnel et le marketing digital tout en favorisant la complémentarité entre les deux approches; comprendre le fonctionnement général d'une stratégie digitale; élaborer une stratégie digitale dans le cadre du plan marketing de l'entreprise.
Particularités
Les personnes intéressées à postuler sont priées de faire parvenir : un curriculum vitae, une lettre d'accompagnement et une copie des diplômes obtenus.
Avant de confirmer un engagement d'emploi, l'Université de Moncton exige que la personne choisie confirme au moyen d'un document officiel accepté par la Santé publique qu'elle a reçu une série complète de vaccins contre la COVID-19 approuvés au Canada ou présente des documents à l'appui d'une exemption pour raison médicale valide.
L'Université de Moncton, fondée en 1963, est un établissement d'enseignement supérieur de langue française en milieu acadien. Avec ses trois campus situés à Edmundston, à Moncton et à Shippagan, elle offre des programmes d'études aux trois cycles universitaires dans plusieurs disciplines. Plus de 5 000 étudiantes et étudiants provenant de partout au Canada et de l'étranger la fréquentent. Pour de plus amples renseignements sur l'Université et ses programmes d'études, vous êtes invités à consulter le site Internet http://www.umoncton.ca
L'Université de Moncton souscrit à l'exigence d'équité en matière d'emploi. Conformément aux exigences relatives à l'immigration au Canada, ce concours s'adresse en priorité aux citoyennes et citoyens canadiens ainsi qu'aux personnes ayant obtenu le droit d'établissement au Canada.
Salaire
Le traitement est établi selon la formation et l’expérience. Les critères servant à établir le salaire sont régis par la convention collective en vigueur.
